text: Note: This only applies when the rewrite directives (aside from the definition of the RewriteMap) are per-dir. When all mod_rewrite directives are in the server config this bug does not express itself.

text:
I tried to reproduce that on windows, but it works as expected in both contexts.

However, I can reproduce the described issue, if "RewriteEngine on" is omitted (or set to "off") in per-server context. In that case (which would be a configuration error) the prog won't be started at server startup, the lookup in per-dir context will fail.
